'''Mini Game Heroes Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Mcnet|mini-game-heroes-now-console|Mini Game Heroes now on console!|June 27, 2017|Tom Stone}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] that builds upon the [[Mini Game Masters Skin Pack]] and is themed around several teams of three characters, each embodying a mob partaking in some sort of sport. This skin pack was released in promotion of the [[mini games]], which were included in the [[Legacy Console Edition]]s, and was part of the [[Mini games#DLC packs 2|Glide Track Pack Season Pass]].
